description: Maps legacy character classes to Aethelgard archetypes and suggested specializations for the migration system.

mappings.migration-description: Your training in stealth and precision translates naturally to the Skirmisher's mobile combat style.
Your frontline combat experience makes you a natural Warrior, excelling in both defense and devastating melee attacks.
Your arcane knowledge aligns with the Mystic's command of the corrupted Aether.
Your healing arts find their truest expression in the Adept's Bone-Setter specialization.
Your scholarly pursuits align with the Adept's knowledge-based specializations.
Your crafting expertise translates to the Adept's creation-focused specializations.
